oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Photograph of The National League for Woman's Service float, French Day Parade, Nashville, Tennessee, 1918 July 14
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A photograph of Ellen Thomas Caldwell, Milbry Keith Frazer and Ann Maddin Palmer of the Davidson County Division of the National League for Woman's Service, riding on a float in the French Day Parade. The League supported the Allied armies in World War I, providing food, blankets, books and an ambulance. The women raised funds to support the Belgian War Orphans Relief, Red Cross, and Liberty Bonds organizations. Forms part of the Nashville Room Historic Photographs Collection. 1 photograph : b & w ; 8 x 10 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Caldwell, Ellen Thomas; Frazer, Milbry Keith; Palmer, Ann Maddin
National League for Woman's Service. Davidson County Division
